vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the Arabs living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.25.15;
son of: Ishmael (H3458);
brother of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
§ Naphish or Nephish = "refreshment"
1) the next to last son of Ishmael
2) an Arabian tribe
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿非施 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "心曠神怡"
1) 以實瑪利的兒子
2) 一個阿拉伯部落 #代上 5:19|
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿非施 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "心旷神怡"
1) 以实玛利的儿子
2) 一个阿拉伯部落 #代上 5:19|
